channel.title: Projects on Ray Schneider
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Ray Schneider

item.title: Newdevlaptop
item.description: The new laptop an HP Envy machine with AMD chipset (Ryzen) and 2TB of disk accompanied by 64G of memory. Heres a link: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B09Q1R99K7?psc=1&ref=ppx_yo2ov_dt_b_product_details So far I am giving Pop!OS Linux a try based off a recommendation from a friend. It seems this machine is a touch too new to have everything work, but so far the only thing I have noticed not functional are the internal Bang & Olufsen speakers.

item.title: Coming Soon
item.description: Adding space here for technical projects. Several are on deck as I build a new home lab. I’ll likely cover its build out, and then I will start covering work that I do in the lab. Its going to be fun!
